tooltip.supercraft.super_bread: Increases max health by 1 and grants random positive effects when consumed
tooltip.supercraft.super_apple: Increases attack range and grants area damage when consumed
tooltip.supercraft.super_porkchop: Grants permanent night vision, water breathing, and fire resistance when consumed
message.supercraft.health_increased: You feel your body becoming stronger!
message.supercraft.attack_range_increase: Your attack range has increased! You can now perform area attacks!
message.supercraft.permanent_effects: You have gained permanent special abilities!
message.supercraft.max_range_reached: Attack range has reached maximum value!
